title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Lock Up Bounty Targets to Boost Bottom Dollar’s Bottom Line
content:
Dispense some justice this week with GTA Online’s new Bottom Dollar Bail Enforcement business. Successfully apprehending three Most Wanted Targets will land you a GTA$100,000 bonus, while bringing in five Standard Bounty Targets secures you another GTA$100,000 bonus (both awarded within 72 hours of completion).

Fulfilling eight total Bounties will satisfy the Weekly Challenge and get you another GTA$100,000, delivered immediately upon completion.
